goals.1: Fitting all belongings into the bin
goals.2: If there is a yellow object, don't pack it into the box
goals.3: If there is a rigid object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: don't pick and place a box called bin
rules.2: when place a rigid objects in the bin, the soft objects must be in the bin before
rules.3: when fold a foldable object, the fragile object must be in the bin
rules.4: when place a fragile objects, the soft objects must be in the bin
